## pad() function

Pad a string to the specified width.

Adds trailing spaces to each line to reach the specified width. Preserves ANSI escape sequences.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function pad(s: string, width: number, options?: PadOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

s


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The string to pad


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

width


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Target width for each line


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[PadOptions](./terminal-reflowjs.padoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Padding options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The padded string

## Example


```ts
pad("hello", 10);
// "hello     "
```
